FindRoom.description: We offer a wide range of rooms so you can find the perfect option for your stay. Browse through our portal and discover unique accommodations.

section2.question1: Are you looking for a comfortable, well-located, and affordable room? You'll find it here!
section2.text1: At RentRoom, we connect people looking for a place to feel at home with available rooms. Whether for a short stay or to live for months, we have the perfect option for you.
section2.text2: We know that looking for a room is not just about finding four walls; it's about finding a space where you feel good, where you can start a new chapter, where you can be yourself. That's why we're here to accompany you on this journey.

aboutRooms.title: Find your next perfect space
aboutRooms.description: Explore amazing options to find the ideal place that fits your needs and lifestyle.
aboutRooms.description2: Explore amazing options to find the ideal place that fits your needs and lifestyle.

articles.title: How to find the perfect room
articles.content: Looking for a comfortable and affordable place? Discover practical tips on how to choose a room that suits your budget, style, and daily needs. Make your search a simple and effective experience!

articles.title: The best areas to rent in the city
articles.content: Not sure which neighborhood is right for you? Explore the features of the best areas to live, from the calmest to the liveliest. Find the perfect balance between location and comfort.

articles.title: What tenants are saying
articles.content: Read the experiences and recommendations from those who have already lived with us. Their stories will help you make an informed decision about where and how to live in our community.

articles.title: First time renting? Tips for your first room
articles.content: If you're new to renting, we offer a practical guide on everything you need to know: from what questions to ask to how to prepare for the move. Start this new chapter with confidence!

Knowus.title: WHO WE ARE
Knowus.description: At Rent Room, we are not a big company or a cold rental platform. We understand that searching for a room can be a journey full of doubts and important decisions. That’s why we created this space with you in mind, to make your search easy, safe, and tailored to your needs.

text1: We believe that a home is much more than just a place to sleep. It’s where your days begin and where you return to rest. It’s your refuge.
We are committed to trust and transparency. We want you to feel free to ask anything you need, without pressure.
We love connecting people. We want every room listed on our website to be an opportunity to create a pleasant, respectful coexistence where you feel at home.
text2: We review every listing to ensure everything is in order.
We support you throughout the entire process. If you have any questions or need help, we are here to listen.
We want you to arrive at your new home with the peace of mind that you have made the best decision.

OurTeam.title: Our Team
OurTeam.description: At RentRoomBCN, our team is made up of passionate individuals who love what they do. We believe that the success of our company is based on the dedication, commitment, and experience of each team member.

teamMembers.name: Alex
teamMembers.description: With extensive experience in the real estate sector, Alex leads the team and ensures that every client receives the best possible attention.

teamMembers.name: David
teamMembers.description: David is responsible for providing exceptional customer service, ensuring that every person has an unforgettable experience with RentRoomBCN.

contactForm.acceptLabel: I accept the processing of my data

FFCC71: Budget room in Zona Franca, quiet area next to parks. Single bed, desk and wifi.
RB219: Single room in Sants-Montjuïc 10 minutes from all city services. Single bed, desk and wifi.
AAFF33: Room in shared flat in Zona Franca, near Granvia 2 shopping centre. Single bed, desk and wifi.

housemates.title: Your Housemates:
housemates.owner: The owner does not live in the house

house_environment.title: House Environment:
house_environment.quiet: Quiet, no visitors and silence prevails

FAQ.question: Are pets allowed?
FAQ.answer: No pets allowed in the rooms.

FAQ.question: Are there weekly cleaning services?
FAQ.answer: Some properties include weekly cleaning services. Check the description of each room for more details.

FAQ.question: Is there a washing and drying machine available?
FAQ.answer: Some rooms provide access to washing and drying machines. Check the listing for specific details.

FAQ.question: Is WiFi provided?
FAQ.answer: Yes, all rooms have free WiFi.

FAQ.question: Can I have visitors?
FAQ.answer: Most rooms allow visitors. Please check with the property owner before receiving visitors.

FAQ.question: Can I request maintenance at any time?
FAQ.answer: Yes, you can request maintenance at any time, but it is recommended to inform in advance to schedule the intervention.

FAQ.question: Is there anything I need to bring?
FAQ.answer: It is recommended to bring your personal belongings, such as bedding, towels, and kitchen utensils. Some rooms may include these services.

Faq.subtitle: Still Have Questions? Reach Out to Us!

houseFeatures: Equipped kitchen: fridge, oven, microwave, washing machine.

RoomDetails.roomTitle: Affordable room in Zona Franca – tranquility and comfort
RoomDetails.roomDescription: If you are looking for a comfortable and well-located place to live, this room in Zona Franca could be perfect for you.
roomDetails: Spacious and bright room with a window
Fully furnished: 90x200 bed, wardrobe, desk, study chair, heating.
Fiber optic internet access (WiFi and wired connection)
* Bed linen and towels not included
roomConditions: €50/month fee for shared expenses (electricity, water, gas, and fiber optic internet)
One-month deposit. Refundable upon contract completion and room handover
Smoking is not allowed inside the apartment
Weekly cleaning of common areas (hallway, bathroom, and kitchen) included
RoomDetails.roomAtmosphere: Your housemates are men aged between 20 and 70, who study or work. The apartment is usually very quiet, visits are rare, and silence prevails. The owner does not live in the house.
RoomDetails.roomUbi: Sants-Montjuïc District – Zona Franca. An industrial area that has transformed into a modern and constantly developing environment. It is located southwest of Barcelona, very close to the port and the airport. Perfect for those looking for a functional and well-connected place.
RoomDetails.contactInfoDescription: I'm available to answer any questions you may have!

avisoLegal1.heading: 1. IDENTIFICATION OF THE WEBSITE OWNER
avisoLegal1.content1: In compliance with the information duty established in
avisoLegal1.content2: Law 34/2002, on Information Society Services and Electronic Commerce (LSSI-CE)
avisoLegal1.content3: , the following details of the website owner are provided:

avisoLegal2.heading: 2. GENERAL TERMS OF USE
avisoLegal2.content1: This Legal Notice regulates access and use of the website [Website Name] (hereinafter, [the Website]). Using the Website grants the status of user and implies full and unreserved acceptance of all provisions included in this document in the version published at the time of access.
avisoLegal2.content2: The user agrees to use the Website, its services, and content in accordance with applicable laws, good faith, generally accepted practices, and public order. Any use of the website for illegal purposes or that may harm the website owner or third parties is prohibited.

avisoLegal3.heading: 3. USER RESPONSIBILITY
avisoLegal3.content1: The user assumes responsibility for using the Website. This responsibility extends to any registration required to access certain services or content. In such registration, the user is responsible for providing truthful and lawful information. As a result of this registration, the user may be provided with a password, which they are responsible for keeping confidential and using diligently.
avisoLegal3.content2: The user agrees to use the content and services provided by [Company Name] through the Website appropriately and, including but not limited to, agrees not to use them to:
avisoLegal3.content3: Engage in unlawful or illegal activities or those contrary to good faith and public order.
avisoLegal3.content4: Distribute racist, xenophobic, illegal-pornographic, terrorist-supporting, or human rights-violating content or propaganda.
avisoLegal3.content5: Cause damage to the physical and logical systems of [Company Name], its providers, or third parties.
avisoLegal3.content6: Introduce or spread computer viruses or other physical or logical systems that could cause the aforementioned damages.

avisoLegal4.heading: 4. INTELLECTUAL AND INDUSTRIAL PROPERTY
avisoLegal4.content1: All content on the Website, including but not limited to texts, photographs, graphics, images, icons, technology, software, graphic design, and source codes, constitutes a work owned by [Company Name], without any exploitation rights being transferred to the user beyond what is strictly necessary for proper use of the Website.
avisoLegal4.content2: Likewise, all trademarks, trade names, or distinctive signs appearing on the Website are owned by [Company Name], and access to the Website does not grant any rights over them to the user.

avisoLegal5.heading: 5. EXCLUSION OF WARRANTIES AND LIABILITY
avisoLegal5.content1: [Company Name] is not responsible, under any circumstances, for damages of any nature that may be caused, including but not limited to:
avisoLegal5.content2: Errors or omissions in the content.
avisoLegal5.content4: Transmission of viruses or malicious programs despite having adopted all necessary technological measures to prevent them.

avisoLegal6.heading: 6. MODIFICATIONS
avisoLegal6.content1: [Company Name] reserves the right to make changes to its portal without prior notice, including modifying, deleting, or adding content and services provided through the Website, as well as the way they are presented or located.

avisoLegal7.heading: 7. EXTERNAL LINKS
avisoLegal7.content1: If the Website contains links or hyperlinks to other Internet sites, [Company Name] does not exercise any control over these sites and content. Under no circumstances will [Company Name] assume responsibility for any external website content, nor guarantee technical availability, quality, reliability, accuracy, scope, truthfulness, validity, or constitutionality of any material or information contained in any such hyperlinks or external websites.

avisoLegal8.heading: 8. RIGHT TO EXCLUSION
avisoLegal8.content1: [Company Name] reserves the right to deny or withdraw access to the portal and/or services offered without prior notice, on its own initiative or at the request of a third party, to users who fail to comply with these General Terms of Use.

avisoLegal9.heading: 9. APPLICABLE LAW AND JURISDICTION
avisoLegal9.content1: The relationship between [Company Name] and the user will be governed by current Spanish regulations, and any dispute will be submitted to the Courts and Tribunals of [City], unless applicable law provides otherwise.

avisoLegal10.heading: 10. CONTACT
avisoLegal10.content1: If any user has any questions regarding these legal terms or any comments about the Website, please contact [Contact Email].

privacidad1.heading: 1. INTRODUCTION
privacidad1.content1: At [Company Name] (hereinafter, “the Company” or “we”), we are committed to ensuring the privacidad and protection of our users’ personal data. This privacidad Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect personal information obtained through our website [Website URL].
privacidad1.content2: Use of this website implies acceptance of this privacidad Policy under the terms set out herein.

privacidad3.heading: 3. DATA WE COLLECT
privacidad3.content1: We may collect the following personal information through forms on our website or interactions with our services:
privacidad3.DatosIdentificacion: Name, surname, address, email, phone number.
privacidad3.datosPago: Banking information in case of purchases or service contracts.
privacidad3.datosTecnicos: IP address, browser type, operating system, browsing data on the website.
privacidad3.datosProporcionados: Through contact forms, comments, or newsletter subscriptions.

privacidad4.heading: 4. PURPOSE OF DATA PROCESSING
privacidad4.content1: The collected personal data will be used for the following purposes:
privacidad4.content2: Managing the relationship with users and customers.
privacidad4.content3: Processing requests, inquiries, or service contracts.
privacidad4.content4: Sending commercial and promotional communications, if the user has given consent.
privacidad4.content5: Improving user experience and optimizing the website.
privacidad4.content6: Complying with legal and regulatory obligations.

privacidad5.heading: 5. LEGAL BASIS FOR DATA PROCESSING
privacidad5.content1: The processing of personal data is based on:
privacidad5.content21: , given when filling out forms or accepting cookie use.
privacidad5.content31: , when processing is necessary for providing a requested service.
privacidad5.content41: , such as tax or billing requirements.
privacidad5.content51: , when processing is necessary for improving our services.

privacidad6.heading: 6. DATA RETENTION
privacidad6.content1: Personal data will be retained for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which they were collected and, subsequently, for the periods required by applicable law.

privacidad7.heading: 7. DATA SHARING WITH THIRD PARTIES
privacidad7.content1: We do not share users' personal data with third parties, except in the following cases:
privacidad7.content3: Service providers (hosting, payment platforms, marketing) under agreements ensuring data security.
privacidad7.content4: In case of company acquisition or merger, in which case data may be transferred to the new owner.

privacidad8.heading: 8. USER RIGHTS
privacidad8.content1: The user has the right to:
privacidad8.content21: their personal data and obtain information about its processing.
privacidad8.content41: of their data when no longer needed for the purposes they were collected.
privacidad8.content51: of their data in certain circumstances.
privacidad8.content61: to the processing of their data for commercial purposes.
privacidad8.content71: of their data to another service provider.
privacidad8.content8: To exercise these rights, the user may submit a request to
privacidad8.content82: , attaching a copy of their identity document.
privacidad8.content9: If they believe their rights have been violated, they may file a complaint with the

privacidad9.heading: 9. SECURITY MEASURES
privacidad9.content1: We have implemented technical and organizational security measures to protect personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, loss, or destruction.

cookies1.heading: 1. INTRODUCTION
cookies1.content1: The website [Company Name] (hereinafter, the 'Website') uses cookies and similar technologies to improve user browsing experience, provide functionalities, and obtain usage statistics.
cookies1.content2: This Cookie Policy explains what cookies are, what types we use, and how you can manage them.

cookies2.heading: 2. WHAT ARE COOKIES?
cookies2.content1: Cookies are small text files stored on the user's device (computer, tablet, or mobile) when visiting a website. They allow the site to remember information about the visit, making it easier to use and improving the browsing experience.

cookies3.heading: 3. TYPES OF COOKIES WE USE
cookies3.content1: On our Website, we use the following types of cookies:

cookies31.heading: 3.1. Based on their purpose
cookies31.content21: Essential for the Website’s operation. Without them, some services or functionalities may not be available.
cookies31.content31: Help us understand how users interact with the Website by collecting anonymous information.
cookies31.content41: Allow remembering user preferences, such as language or regional settings.
cookies31.content51: Used to display relevant and personalized ads based on the user's browsing habits.

cookies32.heading: 3.2. Based on their duration
cookies32.content21: Automatically deleted when the user closes the browser.
cookies32.content31: Remain on the user's device for a specified period or until manually deleted.

cookies33.heading: 3.3. Based on their origin
cookies33.content21: Sent from our own domain ([Company Name]).
cookies33.content31: Managed by external services, such as Google Analytics, social media, or advertising platforms.

cookies4.heading: 4. HOW TO MANAGE COOKIES?
cookies4.content1: Users can manage, block, or delete cookies at any time through their browser settings. Below are links with instructions for the main browsers:
cookies4.content6: If the user disables or deletes cookies, some Website functions may be affected.
cookies4.content7: Personalize your experience by choosing which cookies you want to allow.

cookies5.heading: 5. THIRD-PARTY COOKIES
cookies5.content1: This Website may use third-party services that collect information for statistical and advertising purposes. Below are some of the main external cookie providers:

cookies6.heading: 6. CHANGES TO THE COOKIE POLICY
cookies6.content1: [Company Name] reserves the right to modify this Cookie Policy at any time. Any significant changes will be communicated to users.

bannerCookies.text: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.
bannerCookies.textGoogleMaps: Please enable Google cookies to view location.

FFCC71.description: Located in the heart of Zona Franca, this street is in an industrial area that has evolved into a zone with modern infrastructure, ideal for workers seeking proximity to industrial estates and quick connections to the rest of the city. Additionally, being close to Montjuïc Mountain, it offers tranquility and nature.
text1: Quiet area with modern buildings and spacious surroundings.
Close to the Zona Franca Industrial Estate and the Port of Barcelona.
Gran Via 2 shopping center, supermarkets, and local shops.
text2: Direct buses to Barcelona city center (lines H16, V3, 109).
Near Fira metro station (L9S), with a direct connection to the airport.
Easy access by car to Ronda Litoral and Gran Via.
text3: Surrounded by parks, ideal for walking and exercising.
Open areas and landscaped spaces nearby.

RB219.description: Riera Blanca is a lively street that separates the neighborhoods of Sants and La Bordeta. It is a strategic location for those looking to live close to everything, with a neighborhood atmosphere and excellent transport connections.
text1: Area with local shops, supermarkets, and traditional markets.
Wide variety of bars and restaurants, offering tapas and Mediterranean cuisine.
Pharmacies, banks, and all essential services.
Close to Mercat de Sants, a market with fresh products and a local atmosphere.
Near the Gran Via 2 shopping center.
text2: Badal (L5) and Santa Eulalia (L1) metro stations within walking distance.
Several bus lines (D20, H10, V3) connecting you to the city center and other areas.
10-minute walk to Sants Station, a key railway hub in Barcelona.
text3: Parc de l’Espanya Industrial, with a lake, sports areas, and relaxation spots.
Open areas and landscaped spaces nearby.

AAFF33.description: This street is located in one of the fastest-growing areas of Zona Franca, featuring modern buildings and a strategic location for those working nearby or seeking a quiet environment with good transport links.
text1: Residential and quiet area, with new apartments and wide streets.
Restaurants and bars, ideal for breakfast and lunch menus.
Close to Gran Via 2 Shopping Center, with shops, restaurants, and cinemas.
text2: Fira metro station (L9S) with direct connection to the airport and University Zone.
Urban buses linking to Sants and Plaza España (lines H12, 79, 109).
Easy access by car to Gran Via and Ronda Litoral.
text3: Nearby parks and gardens for walking or exercising.
Open spaces around, ideal for walking and unwinding.
